Title: WORST  OLA ride in CHENNAI.
Review:
I have been traveling with Ola for years in many cities . 
In Chennai also , I have travelled a lot. 
As usual I booked Ola and I waited for the driver to come for 10min and once I sat inside the auto with my bags he asked me the otp which I shared . After that he asked me ola money or cash .. I said it?s Ola money . The second I said that he got so annoyed and gave me two choice leave the auto or cancel the ride and pay him the money. I told him I don?t have money that?s the reason why I booked Ola using Ola money. He said Cancel the ride and leave the auto .
(I am not a person from Tamil Nadu but i can understand the language..cannot speakthough) I said no .. so he canceled the ride by himself. The second he did that I called the customer care still sitting inside the auto because I was so mad ( this is the second time this happening to me .. where I called the customer care talked to them filed a complain and I was promised it won?t happen again ) The customer care executive talked to the driver for 5 min and then passed the phone to me and told me he canceled it .. please wait for few min I have booked another auto for you . I waited and. I received a call from another Ola driver few min after saying he reached the location but he was nowhere there. Two streets ahead he was . They put the wrong location I kept calling him again and again .
He was like I can?t find you cancel the booking .. I didn?t even cancel before that I received a message saying 15rs charged for canceling the Ola ride. I called the customer care again .. she said she will book again for me . I said no thank you . There is no pointing in going now .. I am 40 min late to reach where I wanted to go. 
This is the second time this happening to me. I was burst into tears when I was speaking with her. 
 I am a girl and I want you girls to be safe. 
Just keep this in mind when you depend on Ola at night or when you want to reach somewhere important atleast in Chennai . 
The drivers are craving for money they will force you to cancel the trip and promise you to take you to the same location for that same money .. please don?t fall for that and please don?t encourage that . 
If one person say yes they will expect that from each and every person which later on create incidents like this.

Title: OLA OUTSTATION IS NOT AN ALL INCLUSIVE FARE
Review:
Ola users, beware Ola Ourstaion fare  IS NOT an all inclusive fare rate. They add: 
- driver allowance (Rs. 100 per day)
- night allowance (Rs. 100 if travel between 11pm - 6 am)
- additional Time fare (based on your ride chosen Rs. 150 to Rs. 200 for each extra hour - Users are penalized if there is traffic)
- Additional distance fare (based on your ride chosen, ranges from Rs. 11/km to Rs. 20/km, please check start km and end km inserted in driver dashboard)
- Travel insurance (Rs.49, which you need to explicitly turn off... And not vice versa)
- Toll charges and state tax over and above

Invariably you pay minimum of Rs. 500 more on the fare given in the app. 

Now if you have a rogue driver like I did, who added extra 77kms to my fare from Mumbai to Pune, then be ready for an extra high bill.

It's funny, coz when complaints are raised OLA customer care checks distance covered, time taken, etc. in the navigation system to resolve issues. Then why does the end fare not auto populate on the app, in the same manner? Why is the liberty given to drivers to add arbitrary kms in the dashboard?

I've been using OLA since it's release in Mumbai and proud of its safety & transparency in its business model. This does not resonate well with an avid customer, please revert to the old ways of doing business.
